summary: This document is an email from Lesley Groff to Paul Morris regarding a scheduled appointment with Jeffrey Epstein. It confirms the time and location of the meeting, indicating that all is set for the appointment.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is the sender of the email, confirming an appointment with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email, being informed about the appointment with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the host of the appointment scheduled for 5:30 PM.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is communicating with Paul Morris regarding a professional appointment.
Lesley Groff is associated with Jeffrey Epstein as she is confirming an appointment with him.
Paul Morris is indirectly connected to Jeffrey Epstein through the appointment arranged by Lesley Groff.

events.title: Appointment Confirmation
events.description: Lesley Groff confirms a 5:30 PM appointment with Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff sent an email to Paul Morris regarding an appointment with Jeffrey Epstein.
The appointment is scheduled for 5:30 PM on January 23, 2013.
The location of the appointment is 9 East 71st Street, between 5th and Madison in New York.
